content.task: Assess security implications of compliance violations found in COMPLIANCE_VIOLATIONS_REPORT.md. Particular concern: CI/CD pipeline bypasses with "|| true" flags suppress security tools (bandit, flake8, mypy) that could allow vulnerable code to reach production. Need security-focused remediation priorities.
content.context: Context: Found systematic quality control bypassing including bandit security scans being suppressed in production pipeline, git --no-verify bypasses, and unauthorized SKIP_COMPLIANCE_CHECK mechanism. These create security vulnerabilities by allowing unchecked code into production systems.
